Subject: Reequest for Updated EPP Instance and Assistance with Agent Removal
Description:
Dear End Point Protector team,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

Together with @Enrico Casini, I procured an EPP license some time ago. We successfully deployed the provided VM in our environment, which operates completely offline with restricted access.

 

I would like to request an updated version of the EPP instance. Would it be possible to receive a new VM up to date for deployment in our laboratory?

 

Additionally, we recently encountered a critical issue: the current VM we were running crashed a few days ago. I reinstalled it from scratch, but now I am unable to remove the agents from the machine, even when using an Administrator account. Furthermore, the EPP interface does not allow me to uninstall the agents, resulting in a complete loss of control over them.

 

We urgently require assistance to resolve this issue. Could you please provide guidance on how to proceed?

 

Looking forward to your support.

 

Best regards,

gabriele

 

ESA - European Space Agency 

 

Gabriele Durantini

CSC Security Officer (CSC-IX)

SNL Alternate Security Officer

Cybersecurity Laboratory Manager

TEC-Systems End-to-End Security Section (SES)

 

ESTEC

Keplerlaan 1, PO Box 299

NL-2200 AG Noordwijk, The Netherlands

 

 

This message is intended only for the recipient(s) named above. It may contain proprietary information and/or protected content. Any unauthorised disclosure, use, retention or dissemination is prohibited. If you have received this e-mail in error, please notify the sender immediately. ESA applies appropriate organisational measures to protect personal data, in case of data privacy queries, please contact the ESA Data Protection Officer (dpo@esa.int).
What_We_Know__c:
Customer have difficulties with an old EPP server and they would like to install a fresh EPP server. 

They also encounter issues with the endpoints, that they are not able to uninstall.
Next_Steps__c:
We have provided them the URL from where they can download the EPP server images. 

We have mentioned that they can use the same IP of the EPP server, so that the endpoints can communicate with the new server.

A meeting has been scheduled to discuss in more detailed matter the issue.

In the meeting we have discussed the details regarding the possibility of creating a new VM and how can we assist you and if there is a possibility to update the existing server using the offline patches.

Customer confirmed that he could uninstall his endpoints and he will install a new EPP VM. 
If he will encounter issues will let us know.
Solution_Comment__c: The customer migrated the EPP server to a new one
